author: thomas
text:
552 U. S. ____ (2007)552 U. S. ____ (2007)552 U. S. ____ (2007)SUPREME COURT OF THE UNITED STATESNO. 06-7949BRIAN MICHAEL GALL, PETITIONERv.UNITED
STATESon writ of certiorari to the united states court of
appeals for the eighth circuit[December 10, 2007]Justice Thomas, dissenting.Consistent with my dissenting
opinion inKimbroughv.United States,post,p. ___, I would affirm the judgment of the Court of
Appeals because the District Court committed statutory error when
it departed below the applicable Guidelines range.
